item.title: Custom 3D Printing & Marketplace For Your Designs : iMaterialise
item.description: At the last TEDxLeuven I was gratefully surprised: I found out about Materialise, a world leader and pioneer in industrial 3D printing, which comes out of Belgium. One more of the leading tech companies that not so many people have ever heard about, but which is responsible for the printing of most personalized ear implants in the world. Luckily for me they had a stand at MultiMania and I got a chance to talk with them and to hold and examine some of the printed objects they had with them.

item.title: Samsung 900x3a Ultraportable Review: WOW! The Looks!
item.description: WOW! The Looks The design of the Samsung 9 series makes you scream wow. When you get it, even the box makes you say wow. It is beautiful, sleek and different, something you want to carry around because it will make others say the same and look at you in a much better way. And that is exactly what happens. Wherever Iâ€™ve pulled it out questions have arised about it and everybody wanted to hold it.
